text: Mata kare-ra wa iu. `Kono kachiku no tainai ni aru mono wa, watashi-tachi otoko no sen'yodeari, watashi-tachi no on'na ni wa kinji rareru. Daga shizan no baai wa, dare demo mina sore ni azukareru.' Kare wa, kare-ra no kyoko ni taishi yagate mukuwa reru. Hontoni kare wa eimei ni shite zenchi de ara reru
